name: EDT
description:
The Earth is under attack from an unknown force! Help commander Mega Max defend Earth! Fight over the Pacific Ocean, the Milky Way and on the Sun!
Experience classic arcade space shooter action on your PC with modern features such as the ability to save, pause, save your score and play in different frame rates and for only 69p!!! This is the ultimate arcade shooter, and on your PC with crisp 8bit visuals to relive the retro feeling!!! I have also added great music made by Createdbybrett!!
Compatible with Windows XP, Vista, 7 and 8.
All profits go to Bishop Heber so be sure to buy!!!
